name: 咲耶
text:
──おや
恋鐘、髪に花びらがついているよ
trans:
──Oh?
Kogane, you have a flower petal in your hair.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふぇ！？
どこ～！？
trans:
Fue?!
Where at~!?

name: 咲耶
text: フフ、少しじっとして──
trans: Hehe, hold still for a sec──

name: 咲耶
text: ……よし、取れた
trans: ...Good, that's settled.

name: 咲耶
text:
きっとこの美しい花も、
可憐な恋鐘に惹かれたんだね
trans:
I have no doubts that beautiful flowers stick to
what is also pretty, Kogane.

name: 咲耶
text: 少しでもそばにいたくて、たまらなかったんだ
trans: They were dying to be with someone as lovely as you.

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶は上手く言いすぎやね～
trans: You say the darndest things, Sakuya~

name: 恋鐘
text: でも、ありがと～！
trans: But, thanks for that~!

name: 咲耶
text: ああ
trans: Sure!

name: 咲耶
text: 摩美々、ここにいたのか
trans: So you're here, Mamimi.

name: 摩美々
text: んー
trans: Yep.

name: 咲耶
text:
喉は渇いていないかな？
よければドリンクを
trans:
Are you thirsty or anything?
I can go fetch you a drink if you like.

name: 咲耶
text:
──ほら、美味しそうだろう？
夏の果実が摩美々を待っている
trans:
──Here, don't these look delicious?
The fruits of summer await for your pick, Mamimi.

name: 摩美々
text:
……そういうジュースって
大体なんか挿してあるよねー
trans:
...This kind of juice usually has something
put inside it though.

name: 咲耶
text: 美味しさの秘訣さ
trans: That's just the secret to their great taste.

name: 咲耶
text:
この果物は、見た目でも、もちろん味でも、
夏らしさを感じさせてくれるんだから
trans:
These fruits are dripping with the feeling of summer
not only in looks, but also of course, in flavor.

name: 摩美々
text:
でも、めんどーでしょー
手も汚れるしー
trans:
But, it's a pain to prepare it.
My hands will be all icky.

name: 咲耶
text:
──それならお姫様
飲みやすくなるよう……私が、準備を
trans:
──Well then my Princess, perhaps to make it easier
to drink, allow me to prep it for you.

name: 摩美々
text:
ふふー
苦しゅうなぁい
trans:
Fufu~
No skin off my back~

name: 咲耶
text: ……失礼、霧子
trans: ...Pardon me, Kiriko.

name: 霧子
text:
……？
咲耶さん……
trans:
...?
Sakuya-san...

name: 咲耶
text: 撮影再開まで、少し時間があると聞いたんだ
trans:
I've been told that we have some time before the
shoot resumes.

name: 咲耶
text:
体を冷やしてしまってはいけないと思ってね
よかったらそのタオル、使ってほしい
trans:
I've considered that you might be wanting to
cool off. You may use this towel if you so desire.

name: 霧子
text:
わ……！
ありがとう……
trans:
Wow...!
Thank you...

name: 霧子
text:
ふふ……
プロデューサーさんみたい……
trans:
Fufu...
You're just like Producer-san...

name: 咲耶
text:
それは嬉しい感想だ
あんなにマメな人はそういない
trans:
That's a nice thought.
Not many people can be like him.

name: 霧子
text: うん……
trans: Yes...

name: 霧子
text:
でも……
咲耶さんも……そう……
trans:
But...
Not many people... can be like Sakuya-san...

name: 結華
text: ちょいちょいちょい、さくや～ん？
trans: Hold it right there! Sakuyaaan?

name: 咲耶
text: ああ、結華。お疲れ様
trans: Oh, Yuika. What's up?

name: 結華
text: お疲れ様ー
trans: Nothing much!

name: 結華
text:
……ね
Ｐたん泣いてたよー？
trans:
...But hey, did you know that P-tan is
sulking right now?

name: 咲耶
text: え？
trans: Huh?

name: 結華
text:
『俺の仕事、咲耶にやってもらってばっかりだ……！』
ってさ
trans:
He was all like... "I'm totally useless if Sakuya does all
the work for me...!"

name: 咲耶
text: おや
trans: Oh my.

name: 咲耶
text:
まいったな、そう言われるとは思っていなかった
プロデューサーに悪いことをしたね
trans:
I didn't expect him to say something like that!
It seems I've been quite cruel to Producer.

name: 結華
text:
……さくやんさぁ
なんで今日はそんな至れり尽くせりモードなの？
trans:
...Sakuyan.
Why is it that you're in Final Form today?

name: 咲耶
text: そう見えるかい？
trans: Is that what it looks like?

name: 結華
text: 見えるねぇ
trans: That's what it looks like.

name: 結華
text:
そりゃ、気配りさんはもともとだけどさー？
今日はなんとなく、いつもより気合い入ってる感じするよ
trans:
Well, you've always been attentive to details,
you know? But for some reason you're more
pumped up than usual.

name: 結華
text: ……どうしたのって聞いてもいい？
trans: ...Can you tell me why you're like this?

name: 咲耶
text: 結華は心配性だね
trans: I see that you're concerned, Yuika──

name: 咲耶
text: ──そして少々自意識過剰だ
trans: ──and maybe reading too much into it.

name: 結華
text: えっ
trans: Eh?

name: 咲耶
text:
きっと結華は、私が何か『みんなのために』気を回して
普段より甲斐甲斐しく働いていると思ったんだろう──
trans:
Maybe you were presuming that I'm doing this
because I wanted to please everyone so badly──

name: 咲耶
text:
けれど
何を隠そう、これは私のためでね
trans:
But the thing is...
It's nothing like that. I'm doing this for me.

name: 咲耶
text: たとえば、私がくたびれていた時に──
trans: For example... Like when I was tired and out of it...

name: 咲耶
text:
声をかけてくれたり、
元気づけてくれたりする優しい仲間たちだからこそ
trans:
You and everyone reached out. Because you're
the type of friends who'd cheer me up.

name: 咲耶
text:
私は、私にできることをしたいと思うし、
それで喜んでもらえたとしたら、何より嬉しいんだ
trans:
As for me, I'm doing what I can be a help to others.
And if they're pleased with that, then I'm satisfied.

name: 咲耶
text:
──『私が』
みんなの笑顔を見たいから、やっているんだよ？
trans:
──It's for "my" sake.
I'm doing it because I want to see everyone smiling.

name: 咲耶
text:
これは決して、『みんなのため』じゃない
……もちろん、『結華のため』でも。……ね？
trans:
I'm not doing it for "everyone." And of course,
I'm not doing it for "your" sake either, Yuika. ...Okay?

name: 咲耶
text: だから、自惚れないでほしいな？
trans: So don't get too carried away, alright?

name: 結華
text:
あーあー……！
三峰はっずかしーい
trans:
Aaaah...!
This is too much for Mitsumine~

name: 結華
text:
負けましたー、完敗ですー
まったくさくやんは手強いんだから
trans:
Complete and utter... defeat!
Sakuyan truly is a terrifying opponent!

name: 咲耶
text: フフ、すまない
trans: Hehe, my bad.

name: 結華
text: ──じゃ、三峰も同じ理屈で構おーっと
trans: ──Then Mitsumine will follow your example.

name: 咲耶
text: うん……？
trans: Hmm...?

name: 結華
text:
そろそろ日焼け止め補充したくない？
三峰に塗らせてよ、王子様
trans:
Isn't it about time for your sunscreen to be
reapplied? Allow Mitsumine, to cater to you,
my dear Prince.

name: 結華
text: 三峰のためだと思って、さ？
trans: I'm doing this for Mitsumine's sake, understand?

name: 咲耶
text:
──ああ！
お願いするよ、結華
trans:
──I do!
Go on right ahead, Yuika!
